cgsdata package¶

Submodules¶

cgsdata.CGStable module¶

class cgsdata.CGStable.AvroSchema(name, machine_ip, database='default')[source]¶

Bases: cgsdata.CGStable.CGStable

An AVRO schema

createSchema()[source]¶

Create an AVRO schema

class cgsdata.CGStable.CGStable(name, machine_ip, database='default', table_type='undefined')[source]¶

Bases: object

A CGS table (CGS=Centralized genomic system)

Attributes:
name (string): name of the database (chosen by the user) machine_ip (string): machine ip (master node) to connect to for generating the database source (string): source of information from which we build the schema of the table (typically a csv file) database (string): database name (by default: “default”) table_type (string): table type (ex: “metastore”, “mysql”, “hbase”)
getDatabaseName()[source]¶
getMachineIP()[source]¶
getName()[source]¶
readingTableSourceFile()[source]¶

Reads a source file to rebuild the schema of the table corresponding to the selected type The file is a CSV file with in rows the variable/field names and in columns the table type (ex:hbase, mysql) The table_type should be the name of the chosen column. The CSV file may contain more than one column, only the table_type will be selected.

show()[source]¶
class cgsdata.CGStable.HBaseTable(name, machine_ip, database='default')[source]¶

Bases: cgsdata.CGStable.CGStable

An HBase table in the Hadoop framework

createTable()[source]¶

Create an HBase table This table is created using an HBase script that can be run from a similar command as: $HBASE_HOME/bin/hbase shell createHBaseTable.sh <hbase_table_name> HBase must be installed on the

class cgsdata.CGStable.MetastoreTable(name, machine_ip, database='default')[source]¶

Bases: cgsdata.CGStable.CGStable

A metastore table in the Hadoop framework that can be further queried by Hive, Impala, Pig, etc

Attributes:

createTable()[source]¶

Create a metastore table This table is built using the Hive programming language which should be available on the “machine_ip” (permissions should be given). SSH access should be allowed to built this table
